name: Dataescape.EXE
description:
Help Databot to escape from the system who is trying to eliminate him . Jump to avoid the obstacles and enemies. Survive a long as you can!

-Jump to avoid the obstacles and enemies

-Take the "Dron" to be invulnerable for 5 seconds

-Survive !

CONTROLS : Press "space key" on menu to start the game

                              Navigate on menu with arrow keys

                             Press "left click" to jump
